title: Login
description: Secure authentication screen that allows authorized users to log in using valid credentials, ensuring system safety and access control.

title: Dashboard
description: Centralized dashboard offering a real-time overview of inventory status, recent transactions, alerts, and key performance metrics.

title: Invoice Entry
description: Invoice management module to create, edit, and track purchase and sales invoices with accurate item and pricing details.

title: Product Image Upload
description: Feature that allows users to upload and manage product images, improving item identification and inventory visualization.

title: Invoice Quantity Verification
description: Verification screen to validate invoice quantities against available stock, reducing errors and ensuring accurate inventory records.

title: Indent Transfer Entry
description: Module for recording and managing stock transfers between departments or locations through structured indent entries.

title: Access Policy Report
description: Report screen displaying user access policies and permission levels to ensure compliance and controlled system usage.

title: Dynamic Stock Report
description: Interactive stock reporting module that provides real-time insights into inventory levels, movement trends, and availability.
